comments.comments_text: Aranguiz (Bayer Leverkusen) swings in the corner, but the goalkeeper does a brilliant job to intercept the effort.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Kai Havertz (Bayer Leverkusen). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Jadon Sancho produces a cross from the resulting corner and finds Dan-Axel Zagadou (Dortmund) inside the box. He pulls the trigger and scores, sending the ball low into the middle of the net. What a brilliant finish. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: Brilliant finish! Kevin Volland (Bayer Leverkusen) perfectly collected a pass on the edge of the penalty area from Kai Havertz, then produced a nice strike into the bottom right corner. The score is 1:1.

comments.comments_text: Jadon Sancho (Dortmund) meets a perfect cross from Abdou Diallo deep inside the box and controls it with a nice first touch. He produces an accurate strike into the bottom left corner. The score is 2:1.

comments.comments_text: Paco Alcacer (Dortmund) receives a good pass and from just outside the box he unleashes a promising strike, but the shot is blocked by the defender.
